pages.text: The $(major)Flight/$ Gene $(minor)allows players to fly/$ by double-tapping jump.$(br2)This Gene $(bad)cannot be given to mobs/$.

By default, this Gene requires the following other Genes:$(li)$(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/teleport)Teleport/$$(li)$(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/step_assist)Step Assist/$$(li)$(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/no_fall_damage)No Fall Damage/$
